data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>…………。

data.text: Bright……。
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Bright……。

data.text:
Special Week-sama was truly magnificent. Her strength in the 
straights, and the stubbornness to never yield the front……
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>Special Week-sama was truly magnificent. Her strength in the 
<story>straights, and the stubbornness to never yield the front……

data.text:
……with all of my strength, I hit her with everything I could 
muster. But, I couldn't catch up…… Uuuu…… I couldn't catch her……！
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>……with all of my strength, I hit her with everything I could 
<story>muster. But, I couldn't catch up…… Uuuu…… I couldn't catch her……！

data.text:
Bright really does resemble me, huh……？ 
Even the depth of your frustration is identical.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>Bright really does resemble me, huh……？ 
<story>Even the depth of your frustration is identical.

data.text:
That's why…… you can still run. 
You're definitely not going to give up after coming this far.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed:
<story>That's why…… you can still run. 
<story>You're definitely not going to give up after coming this far.

data.text: Let's run together, from now on too.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Let's run together, from now on too.

data.text: ……Uwaaaaaaa～！ Ryan-oneesamaaaa～～～～！！
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>……Uwaaaaaaa～！ Ryan-oneesamaaaa～～～～！！

data.text: Fufuu……good job out there, Bright.
data.name: Mejiro Ryan
data.processed: <story>Fufuu……good job out there, Bright.

data.text:
Alright then, we're moving on to a photo with the winning team！ 
Special Week-san, please take the center！
data.name: Cameraman
data.processed:
<story>Alright then, we're moving on to a photo with the winning team！ 
<story>Special Week-san, please take the center！

data.text: O-okay！
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>O-okay！

data.text:
What's this, are you feelin' nervous? 
Look sharp, or it'll all go to waste, you know?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>What's this, are you feelin' nervous? 
<story>Look sharp, or it'll all go to waste, you know?

data.text: That's right！ You just won a G1, after all！
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed: <story>That's right！ You just won a G1, after all！

data.text:
That's true but, with this much attention on me, 
it's still a bit hard to settle down～……。
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>That's true but, with this much attention on me, 
<story>it's still a bit hard to settle down～……。

data.text:
Just stay as confident as you have been. 
Just like you were during the race.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Just stay as confident as you have been. 
<story>Just like you were during the race.

data.text: Yeah, you were really cool……！
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Yeah, you were really cool……！

data.text: ……I feel like I'm starting to get just a little closer
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>……I feel like I'm starting to get just a little closer

data.text: Closer to being "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Closer to being "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"?

data.text:
Yeah. During the Derby, I did my best only focusing on myself. 
I will definitely win, while thinking only that……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Yeah. During the Derby, I did my best only focusing on myself. 
<story>I will definitely win, while thinking only that……

data.text:
This time I did my best as well, 
but…… I could hear it.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>This time I did my best as well, 
<story>but…… I could hear it.

data.text:
On the last straight, the moment I truly needed to do my best, 
the voices of everyone cheering for me……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>On the last straight, the moment I truly needed to do my best, 
<story>the voices of everyone cheering for me……

data.text:
And I could see it too. The faces of everyone here, the ones that 
would be the happiest to see me win……！
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>And I could see it too. The faces of everyone here, the ones that 
<story>would be the happiest to see me win……！

data.text:
That's why, while I was running, and even after 
I crossed the goal, I felt like I wasn't alone. 
It was a really reassuring feeling……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>That's why, while I was running, and even after 
<story>I crossed the goal, I felt like I wasn't alone. 
<story>It was a really reassuring feeling……

data.text:
I can't really put it in to words but, to become "Japan's #1 Uma 
Musume" that feeling is probably really important.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I can't really put it in to words but, to become "Japan's #1 Uma 
<story>Musume" that feeling is probably really important.

data.text:
Just like when I was running today and from now on, I think 
"Japan's #1 Uma Musume" is probably somewhere ahead.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Just like when I was running today and from now on, I think 
<story>"Japan's #1 Uma Musume" is probably somewhere ahead.

data.text: This girl who came to Tokyo from the countryside――
data.processed: <story>This girl who came to Tokyo from the countryside――

data.text:
This girl who was always talking about her big 
dream to become "Japan's #1", before I knew it, 
that dream was already within arm's reach.
data.processed:
<story>This girl who was always talking about her big 
<story>dream to become "Japan's #1", before I knew it, 
<story>that dream was already within arm's reach.

data.text: Yeah!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah!

data.text:
Alright then everyone, come a little closer 
so we can get everyone in the picture!
data.name: Cameraman
data.processed:
<story>Alright then everyone, come a little closer 
<story>so we can get everyone in the picture!

data.text:
Alright, Spe! Time for a pose befitting "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", 
you better nail it!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Alright, Spe! Time for a pose befitting "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", 
<story>you better nail it!

data.text: P-pose……！？ Ah, um…… um……！？
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>P-pose……！？ Ah, um…… um……！？

data.text: Alright, here we go～…… big smiles everyone～！
data.name: Cameraman
data.processed: <story>Alright, here we go～…… big smiles everyone～！

data.text: Become! Japan's #1一～！
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Become! Japan's #1一～！

data.text: With a loud voice, Special Week let her dream be known
data.processed: <story>With a loud voice, Special Week let her dream be known

data.text:
As if in response to this girl who was carrying so many 
expectations, the stands erupted in a loud cheer.
data.processed:
<story>As if in response to this girl who was carrying so many 
<story>expectations, the stands erupted in a loud cheer.
